name: Asylum - 9 (Nine) - 11/18
additionalNotes: Asylum 9 cigars were made to honor the 9th Anniversary of the highly popular Asylum line that’s produced by master cigarmakers Tom Lazuka and Christian Eiroa. 2021 marks the third consecutive anniversary cigar released by Asylum and includes the same 70 x 7 and signature 11/18 figurado offerings, but unlike the Asylum 7 and Asylum 8, this series includes a massive 90 x 9 behemoth. Dating back to his head of Camacho days, Eiroa has a fond love for premium Honduran tobacco, so it should come as no surprise that this three vitola line are Honduran puro’s. Asylum 9 offers a savory array of flavors that includes earth, coffee, leather, toast and spice, all delivered in a smooth, slow burning medium bodied fashion.
